Title: Requires that renewable energy systems projects use materials produced in the United States
Summary: Requires that all materials, including raw materials, used or supplied in the performance of a contract or any subcontract for the construction, reconstruction, alteration, repair, improvement or maintenance of a covered renewable energy system be produced or made in whole or substantial part in the United States, its territories or possessions.
LawCode: Amd ยง66-r, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring that renewable energy systems projects use materials produced in the United States
